**Environment**

```shell
echo Architecuture: (uname -m)

echo /etc/shells content:
cat /etc/shells
echo go location: (which go) && echo go version: (go version)
echo gvm location: (which gvm) && echo g version: (gvm --version)
echo GOROOT: "$GOROOT"
echo GOPATH:  "$GOPATH""
```
